Name: AcquisitionModality
Title: null
Descriptino: Transitive closure of CID 29 AcquisitionModality

Name: ActionCardinalityBehavior
Title: ActionCardinalityBehavior
Descriptino: Defines behavior for an action or a group for how many times that item may be repeated.

Name: ActionConditionKind
Title: ActionConditionKind
Descriptino: Defines the kinds of conditions that can appear on actions.

Name: ActionGroupingBehavior
Title: ActionGroupingBehavior
Descriptino: Defines organization behavior of a group.

Name: ActionPrecheckBehavior
Title: ActionPrecheckBehavior
Descriptino: Defines selection frequency behavior for an action or group.

Name: ActionRelationshipType
Title: ActionRelationshipType
Descriptino: Defines the types of relationships between actions.

Name: ActionRequiredBehavior
Title: ActionRequiredBehavior
Descriptino: Defines expectations around whether an action or action group is required.

Name: ActionSelectionBehavior
Title: ActionSelectionBehavior
Descriptino: Defines selection behavior of a group.

Name: ActionType
Title: ActionType
Descriptino: The type of action to be performed.

Name: SNOMEDCTBodyStructures
Title: SNOMED CT Body Structures
Descriptino: This value set includes all codes from [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 442083009 (Anatomical or acquired body site (body structure)).

Name: Identifier Type Codes
Title: IdentifierType
Descriptino: A coded type for an identifier that can be used to determine which identifier to use for a specific purpose.

Name: IdentifierUse
Title: IdentifierUse
Descriptino: Identifies the purpose for this identifier, if known .

Name: CommonLanguages
Title: Common Languages
Descriptino: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

Name: SNOMEDCTMedicationAsNeededReasonCodes
Title: SNOMED CT Medication As Needed Reason Codes
Descriptino: This value set includes all clinical findings from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar value set.

Name: ParticipantRoles
Title: Participant Roles
Descriptino: Roles of participants that may be included in a care team.  Defined as: Is a Person, Healthcare professional (occupation) or Healthcare related organization (qualifier value).

Name: ProcedurePerformerRoleCodes
Title: Procedure Performer Role Codes
Descriptino: This example value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate a role of a procedure performer.

Name: ProcedureCodes(SNOMEDCT)
Title: Procedure Codes (SNOMED CT)
Descriptino: Procedure Code: All SNOMED CT procedure codes.

Name: ProcedureReasonCodes
Title: Procedure Reason Codes
Descriptino: This example value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate a reason for a procedure.

Name: RequestIntent
Title: RequestIntent
Descriptino: Codes indicating the degree of authority/intentionality associated with a request.

Name: RequestPriority
Title: Request priority
Descriptino: The clinical priority of a diagnostic order.

Name: RequestStatus
Title: RequestStatus
Descriptino: Codes identifying the lifecycle stage of a request.

Name: ResourceType
Title: ResourceType
Descriptino: One of the resource types defined as part of this version of FHIR.

Name: ServiceRequestOrderDetailsCodes
Title: Service Request Order Details Codes
Descriptino: An example value set of Codified order entry details concepts.  These concepts only make sense in the context of what is being ordered.  This example is for a patient ventilation order

Name: TaskCode
Title: Task Codes
Descriptino: Codes indicating the type of action that is expected to be performed

Name: TaskIntent
Title: TaskIntent
Descriptino: Distinguishes whether the task is a proposal, plan or full order.

Name: TaskStatus
Title: TaskStatus
Descriptino: The current status of the task.

Name: ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType
Title: ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType
Descriptino: A role of a place that further classifies the setting (e.g., accident site, road side, work site, community location) in which services are delivered.

Name: BeVSCdHcParty
Title: List of health care parties in Belgium

Name: BeVSBodySiteNursing
Title: Body Site
Descriptino: Body Site

Title: BeVsCoPrescriberChoice
Descriptino: Type of intended performer choice

Name: BeCoPrescriptionStatus

Descriptino: This is the status of the prescription for the coprescriber

Name: BeCommunicationMethod
Title: BeCommunicationMethod
Descriptino: Codes to define a communication method.

Name: BeContrastFluidUse
Title: BeContrastFluidUse
Descriptino: Codes to define the use of contrast fluid.

Name: BeVSPerformerTaskStatusReason
Title: BeVSPerformerTaskStatusReason
Descriptino: Codes to explain the current status of a referral prescription.

Name: BeVSPrescriptionStatusReason
Title: BeVSPrescriptionStatusReason

Name: BeVsProposalType

Name: BeReferralCategory

Name: BeVsRequestIntent
Title: BeVsRequestIntent
Descriptino: The allowed intent codes in the context of referral prescription

Name: BeVSRequestNoteType
Title: BeVSRequestNoteType
Descriptino: Types of notes used in a referral prescription

Name: BeVSRequestedServicesNurse
Title: BeVSRequestedServicesNurse
Descriptino: Codes indicating the requests that can be asked from a nurse.
